wikitext.*:
The '''Battle of Rôs''' was a great battle between [[Elves]] and [[Orcs]], [[Dwarves]],<ref group="note">At this early phase of the legendarium, Dwarves were overwhelmingly portrayed in a negative light.</ref> [[Gongs]] and a few evil [[Men]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in some of the outlines for the continuation of ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref name="Ros">{{LT2|VI}}, p. 283</ref><ref>{{LT2|VI}}, p. 293</ref> No full, detailed account of the battle is given, as it is only mentioned passingly in the ''Lost Tales''.

It took place near the promontory of [[Rôs]] in the [[Great Lands]] during the [[Faring Forth]], and ended in disaster for the Elves (both for those already living in the Great Lands, and the Elves of [[Tol Eressëa]] who came to their rescue), who afterwards went into hiding and eventually ceased to be visible to most Men.<ref name="Ros"/>
